about_the_game:
The full soundtrack for Adventure in King Caries Land

Fully scored and orchestrated music by Max Robert Arnborg.

Track Listing

1 Intro
2 An Unlikely Hero's Adventure
3 An Unlikely Hero's Journey Begins, Adventure in King Caries Theme - Chiptune meets Orchestra
4 SuperTooth - Chiptune
5 Onwards - Chiptune
6 Action Tune, Get the Accessory! - Orchestra
7 Adventure Tune Tooth - Chiptune
8 Adventure Tune Tooth Hero
9 Passage to King Caries Town - Chiptune meets Orchestra
10 Caries Town Funk - Chiptune
11 Caries Town Funk 2 - Chiptune
12 Caries Town Funk Orchestra
13 Premonition of Dreadful Deeds
14 King Caries Lair Neoclassical
15 King Caries ThroneRoom
16 Meeting King Caries Motif
17 Final Battle King Caries
18 Saving The Tooth Fairy and The End
Bonus Track 1 Caries_FM_Jingle
Bonus Track 2 Caries_FM_BreakingNews
Bonus Track 3 CariesFM TunesCariesCollege_FanfareAndMoreCommercials
Bonus Track 4 Ballad_of_King_Caries
Bonus Track 5 Wishy Wash All_Jingle

Orchestral Setup:

Piccolo Flute
2 Flutes
2 oboe
english horn
2 clarinets
bass clarinet
2 bassoons
contra basson
4 Horns
3 trumpets
2 tenor trombones
bass trombone
saxophone quartet
Timpani
Glockenspiel
Snare Drum
Bass Drum
Piatti
Violin I
Violin II
Viola
Violoncello
Contrabass

Rythm section:
Drums, Guitar and Electric Bass

Chiptune:

Squarewave
Sawtooth
Pulsewave
Synthesizer

mp3 files in soundtrack directory.
